author: Keith Carroll
text: 'Food was incredible
column5: I had the pork shank over risotto'

author: Bruce Posner
text: 'A great place for a beer and a tasty meal.'

author: David Rosensaft
text: 'Excellent meal.  Fair prices.  Good service.  Portions large enough to share or take home.  Recommended.'

author: Rob LoBue
text: 'A great little local place with a good variety of options from bar food to Italian to steak & seafood with an excellent outdoor seating area. Court Street is a Hoboken institution.'

author: Alejandra Limones
text: "Regulars G&T's and wings!"

author: Manuel Efrain Farfan Ochoa
text:
'(Translated by Google) good service and very friendly cozy and quiet I recommend

(Original)
buen servicio y muy amables acogedor y tranquilo recomiendo'

author: Jade Briggs
text: 'I\'ve had the best lamb in Hoboken and wrote a great review i had the worst lamb in Hoboken and wrote a review. So coming in second best deserves the same. Not only is the lamb portion twice the size of others they actually know what medium rare is. I will admit it wasn\'t full of robust flavor and the rosemary as advertised but it was juicy and had the basic salt and pepper which does meat well when cooked properly.\nafter writing my original review of this place I decided to order using their delivery service. when asked if I wanted to leave a tip for the driver I told them I would be tipping in cash. The driver text me and said five minutes away I replied "ok apt 1" my bell rings twice and when I go to the door my food was left on the door knob of the entry way door on the first level of the building. Then he came back and managed to climb those steps to double check if I paid. I\'ll be picking up my food from here on out.'

author: Katherine Kaplan
text: 'Food is great
column5: but they will not deliver outside of Hoboken
column6: otherwise I would order from them once a week. When asked
column7: they say its because they will only keep one delivery person on staff and do not want to send him outside of Hoboken.'

author: Two Spoons
text:
'Overall - Food was good ... service was not

Food - Ordered entrees from the daily menu and appetizer from the regular menu.  All items were fresh and had a good diversity in flavors .

Service - Took time to make reservation
column5: but that did not help.  Arrived and both wait staff and bar staff made eye contact and then proceeded to ignore us.  Finally figured out where the hostess stand was and after waiting to get help eventually we were seated.  Waited
column7: waited and finally bus staff member took initiative to take our order.  Waitress spent the rest of our time there barely checking on us and taking unnecessarily long time to do anything.  Again
column8: bus staff made sure water was refilled
column9:
etc.

Atmosphere - Sat outside (with reservation) ended up in section that is artificial turf  under canopies.  Bit tricky to move chairs and get situated at table but overall reasonable COVID style setup.

Price - Food was a good value
column10: but service level made things feel like it was too costly.'

author: Dusan Pavlovic
text: "First time here and I've lived in the neighborhood like 34 years.\nHad the skate and it was made to perfection. Place is all right."

author: Joe Santiago
text: 'Veal was great. Was there for a private party

author: Tiffany K.
text: "My partner and I had the lamb and steak entrees and they were amazing! It's a cool low key bar and they have a stack of trivia cards at the tables next to the bar to play while waiting for food. Staff was great. Nice place for a date. Could use some more classic bar food on their menu"

author: L T
text: 'Delicious eggs Benedict w smoked salmon!'

author: Andy Polack
text: 'Food at best was mediocre

author: Anoosh Zain
text: 'Went for the lobster fest on Wednesday.. food was good! Salad/soup
column8: some beetroot mash for $28! It’s a lot of food! Lobster was really enjoyable! Definitely would come back for the food. Service was not good at all though. Nobody asked us how we were

author: Kathleen O'Hara
text: 'Classic menu with amazing seafood dishes and awesome daily specials'

author: Andy Napolitano
text: 'The absolute best! Amazing food

author: Jay Chua
text: 'Was not at all crowded but food was mediocre and slow to arrive.\n\nAnd for some arcane reason
column5: I had to ask for water three times for it to arrive. Turned an evening unpleasant
column6: as one hour is way too long to wait for dinner. Will likely not visit again.'

author: Erik Olson
text: 'Amazing food
column5: amazing service! Very accommodating to my large party! Rave reviews on the rack of lamb

author: R G
text: "Nice restaurant. looks like a nice neighborhood establishment. Decent food.  Menu was more varied and sophisticated than expected (that's a good thing)"

author: Jorge Ojeda
text: "Prime Rib is top notch. Highly recommend! Available on Monday's."

author: Kimberly “ ” Watson
text: 'Delicious food! Wonderful wait staff!'

author: Technog M
text: 'Excellent steak and sides. Very good service too.'

author: Melissa Lopez
text: 'Its perfect for date night...service was quick and precise...was able to be seated for two with no reservations...INSIDE...cant say enough about the food...DELICIOUS! Will return very soon!'

author: Hugo Long
text: 'This spot is excellent! Fair pricing
column5: large portions and the employees are always super nice.'

author: Geoffrey Gordon
text: 'Never a bad meal here in all of the 6 years that I have been frequenting this establishment.  Their olive tapenade is outstanding. Their daily salads
column5: entrees and desserts are too delicious to mention. Monday is prime rib night and Wednesday is Lobster however any night with any of their fish
column7: or chicken specials is a good choice. The cheesecake is awesome.'

author: Lucy McGillicuddy
text: 'Went there with my boyfriend to pay for overly expensive mediocre food.\nFirst and last time there.'

author: C Dub
text: 'Food was great and Tasty! The service was unmatched!! Everything was amazing ❤️❤️'

author: neel thakkar
text: 'The food quality is horrible. Breads served cold. Fries refried 3 times and burnt completely. Almost choked me. Never coming back for such poor quality of food and service (we felt rushed)'

author: Karen Wang
text: 'This is the place to go when you want a good meal and to feel relaxed. The staff is always professional and friendly. I always look forward to seeing what they have on their daily menu!'

author: Morgan Douglas
text: 'We went to Court Street for the first time last night and we were blown away. The service was efficient and our server was friendly. We got the chorizo and mussels appetizer and it was phenomenal. For entrees we got the halibut over risotto and the lamb shank with potatoes au gratin and whipped beets. Both were to die for. We will absolutely be going back. This was our first time dining inside in almost a year and we felt safe the entire time. The staff were all compliant with masks and there was hand sanitizer everywhere. All the tables were adequately spaced for safe dining. We cannot wait to go back.'

author: Bhargava V
text: 'Food was delicious! The coconut shrimp and the surf & turf entree are a must try.\nWe’ll probably swing by again just to get these again. Thank you!'

author: Buyannemekh Munkhbat
text: 'Great atmosphere

author: Michael thelusma
text: 'Food was okay noy quite what one was expecting.'

author: walter dirkin
text: "The food is still great. I can't wait until they get back to full seating. One of the best restaurants in town."

author: Laura Aquino
text: 'First time eating here and was impressed. Great food and service. The menu had some nice and unique offerings. I went with the short ribs which fell right off the bone. Highly recommend.'

author: Tom Koty
text: 'Incredibly vast menu. Also incredibly good food and service. Great local place!'

author: Robert Schmid
text: 'Court Street is COVID protocol compliant with both great food and a wonderfully efficient
column6: and knowledgeable staff. My martini was perfect and so was my steak frites. Everyone else in our group was equally pleased. Highly recommended. Pics are steak frites and the pork chop special.'

author: Linda Ghirardi
text: 'The food was excellent and the wait staff was very attentive. I highly recommend this eatery!'

author: Joelle Eberhart
text: 'Service was very slow and ended up with two different waitresses by the end of the night. At least the food was good! Cooked right and great taste.'

author: Tod Buchanan
text: "I think Court Street is one of the best restaurants in Hoboken. I go there all the time. But during this pandemic I haven't gone as often as I would like. I still order take out though. On Monday night they have a Prime Rib Special! The Prime Rib is large and delicious. You never go away hungry. And
column7: along with some bread and a special spread. The staff is great and always accommodating. I ordered it last Monday and I had forgotten how great it was. Enjoy your next meal there!"

author: Tim Preziosi
text: 'When you speak of comfort food and hospitality your mind should go to Court Street. This place epitomizes both on such a professional level that its priceless. The friendliness of the staff to their back of the house culinary expertise is amazing and highly recommend. It is a main stay of Hoboken and I hope they continue the pride they take in their work for years to come for the benefit of us all.'

author: Joseph DiMaria
text: 'During this time of COVID its very refreshing to know that you can enjoy a wonderful and pleasurable dinner out.  The food is excellent and the menu covers anything and everything you could want to for dinner.  The wait staff is very pleasant and super attentive.  We love this place and go there anytime we are in Hoboken.  If you are ever in Hoboken you definitely need to check this place out.  Y'

author: Diego Perez
text: 'Excellent food and service'

author: Maureen Ghosh
text: 'Wobderful to eat out. Great food and service. A Hoboken gem.'

author: Martina Harris
text: 'People were very nice and the food is good too.  Nice wine selection'

author: Kevin Burke
text: 'Great food and great service this is our go to spot now'

author: adam odiorne
text: 'Best food
column5: cocktails and service in Hoboken by far.'

author: William Kemp
text: 'I celebrated my graduation earlier this evening in this great place. Well we had a fantastic evening and the place was definitely the reason for that happy event. The crew  cooperated in a lovely style
column5: the cuisine was great and my guests were very  overjoyed. We shall surely return for more celebrations. thanks very much.'

author: Barry Lubin
text: 'Brunch was excellent

author: Sadaf Farsinejad
text: 'Very good quality food!'

author: Kenneth Sauder
text: 'It was great! The squash and lamb chops were fabulous! Thanks to the servers. Thanks for the free wine! Ken'

author: Anthony Haddad
text: 'I never review eateries
column6: I have been to Court Street at least 20 times in the last year. This spot will spoil you in aspects of quality and service. Nothing else in the area really can compare. It’s clean
column7: it’s reliable and it’s consistent. I have yet to have a bad experience here. I actually find myself only bringing the best of friends to Court Street
column8: like it’s some sort of little secret. I love it and I hope they never change. I hope they are here forever. (Or as long as I live).\n\nFret not
column9:
the specials are always spot on.
& do not skip on desert.

This is the gold standard of what classic American restaurants and beyond should be. & Where else but Hoboken.'

author: Louis Donoso
text: 'Item are missing.'

author: S Chadwick
text: 'Excellent food and service. Nice wine list. Great value.'

author: Gregg Saldutti
text: 'One of the best in Hoboken'

author: Dave Curran
text: "I love this place. The first time we went they had the crepes. Then the next two times they didn't. Turns out they're a special occasion dessert and new year's eve was one of them so that's where we went for dinner.  When we made the reservation we asked if the dessert goddess could have strawberries to add to the dessert they had posted online and they followed through. This is a must go for me"

author: Kevin Arms
text: 'Great service and tasty steaks..  One of our favorite places when visiting Hoboken!'

author: Gjergj Tr
text: 'Nice
column5: and quiet for a catch up brunch with friends.\nGreat service too!'

author: Helen Feinstein
text: 'Very nice menu with something for everyone. Food well prepared.'

author: Evelyn T.
text: 'One of my favorite restaurants in Hoboken! This is a nice spot w friendly service and the wine selection is dope too.'

author: Gillibee
text: 'My favorite restaurant in Hoboken! Their specials are out of this world and affordable. Great for an after work drink and pub grub or a fancy dinner. They have a bunch of weekday specials including a prix fixe menu for only $22. Definitely recommend.'

author: Jason F
text: 'Great daily specials. Huge variety. Seafood and meat is always fresh. A little on the pricier side but worth it.'

author: Donna Gattuso
text: 'Big portions

author: Philo recipe Franzone
text: 'My favorite place.'

author: Moran Davison
text: "Nice family and homey place
column5: the food is ok but nothing to exciting
column6: great location and easy to get to if you're in Hoboken"

author: Alex Kushner
text: 'Great atmosphere and even better chicken parm'

author: adam decicco
text: "I've been coming here for over 20 years and have never been disappointed. Food is always good
column5: never over salted. The olive tapenade is the best I've had anywhere on earth. They offer it for sale to take home. If you ever eat here and don't take a jar home

author: Marie Beyer
text: 'Unusual fare. Surprisingly
column5: I Didnt miss meat at all because the food was excellent as was the service and unique cocktails. Highly recommend'

author: Martin Le Voi
text: 'Poor food  and indifferent service'

author: Stephen Antisz
text: 'The food lacked flavor but the portions were decent. We did not try a main entree just burger and a steak sandwich. The location is great and next time we will just enjoy the bar.'

text: 'Excellent food and service .  Wonderful specials and specialty cocktails.'

text: 'Love this place - Food

author: samantha pelc
text: 'Awesome food and always something new and interesting for their specials! Me and my gf always go in on mondays for some cocktails and their  prime rib special. The bartender
column6: is always super attentive and a great conversationalist!!'

text: 'Food amazing as always!'

text: 'Awesome food and awesome service'

author: Jessie Taylor
text: 'Nice spot for a fancy date night or a place to bring your parents. Friendly service. Great wine selection.'

author: Chuck Corradino
text: 'Great staff!  Juan and Jeff are outstanding!  The food is exquisite!  A big plus

text: 'Always great food and a selection for everyone'

text: 'Yummy brunches'

text: 'A first class restaurant worthy of your special occasion celebration.'

author: Bobby Richards
text: 'Good food great service'

author: Oliver Walsh
text:
'Best food in Hoboken hands down.
Go in and order something off of the specials menu you will not be let down.
After living in Hoboken for 5+ years this is the only spot I ate at consistently that didn’t let me down in the end or grow tired/old on my tastes.

They also serve Hoboken Brewing beer here Bodi Blonde Ale is recommended for any meal. Tastes as good with a heavy steak as it does with light seafood meals'

author: Ant Live06
text: 'Awesome food! Good service!'

author: Anthony Foster
text: 'Wonderful place! Great atmosphere

author: Matthew Walsh
text: "We were a party of five and everyone was  pleased with their meal. Court Street's menu\nregular menu as well as their special  covers  everything from pasta
column5: meats and fish. I have\nbeen there three times an haven't had a bad\nmeal or experience yet."

text: 'Good mix of sports bar and nice restaurant atmospheres. Specials are great!'

author: Sean Glendon
text: 'Small little place with a solid crowd and atmosphere. The food was fantastic. Decent beer choices. French onion soup was good and the surf and turf was a great value. It appears there are some week night specials I need to check out!'

text: 'Always great to amazing. Service on point

author: T. Pisani
text: 'A nice quiet atmosphere in both the front bar area and the back table area. Service was quick and the food was great. The menu was honestly a little too big for my liking though.'

text: 'Great food

author: Theodore Mullally
text: 'Always a wonderful place to ring in the New Year with a fantastic meal! Warm and friendly atmosphere and great service!'
